Articles.Content: I sniped both of you and then planted several Tall-Nuts and Pea Pods and Torchwoods and slipped away for it. No one's hill.

I get a sonic pen and a sonic screwdriver and point them end-to-end. The resulting reverberation explodes your head.

My hill.

I cover the hill with rolls, suffocating everyone in the hill.

My bread-covered hill.

I eat you and the rolls.

My hill.

Them dang snipes...

![military-sniper_00378928.jpg](http://wallpoper.com/images/00/37/89/28/military-sniper_00378928.jpg)

My hill

> 
> Them dang snipes...
> [http://wallpoper.com/images/00/37/89/28/military-sniper_00378928.jpg](http://wallpoper.com/images/00/37/89/28/military-sniper_00378928.jpg)
> 
> My hill

I know, sniper/marksman tactics are very useful.

Anyway...

I dive-bombed you (Bull's eye!). No one's hill.

I claim the abandoned hill.

My hill.

I then shut down the Mikeman dimension, thereby eliminating Mikeman. I then buried some hundred highly explosive mines on the hill.

No one's hill.

I use rolls to build a new hill.

My hill.

I drop a BLU-82 out of a K-130 Kargo plane, detonating all the mines on Designer225's hill, and (as a side benefit), blows Designer 225 into low Kerbin orbit. (Seroiusly, dude, DON'T SIT ON YOUR SPARE MINES!!!!! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif) )

My (burnt and cratered) hill.

I send 10 BMPTs to the hill. 

No one's hill.

I still am sitting in my roll-based hill.

My hill.

I unleash a swarm of locusts on Bigcheecho's roll-based hill.

No hill.

I make a hill out of granite.

My granite hill.

> 
> I drop a BLU-82 out of a K-130 Kargo plane, detonating all the mines on **Designer225's hill**, and (as a side benefit), blows Designer 225 into low Kerbin orbit. (Seroiusly, dude, DON'T SIT ON YOUR SPARE MINES!!!!! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif) )
> My (burnt and cratered) hill.

> 
> I then shut down the Mikeman dimension, thereby eliminating Mikeman. I then buried some hundred highly explosive mines on the hill.
> **No one's hill**.

So I forgot to mention the part that I left the hill.

> 
> I make a hill out of granite.
> My granite hill.

Moving on, I mined the granite and cause a shaking that killed you. Then I left and sold all the granite I mined. No one's hill.

I buy the granite off of you and rebuild the hill.

My hill.

I then sniped you **400 feet** away.

No one's hill.

I call in an airstrike on Designer225, then retake the hill.

My hill.

"hey guys, there are pancakes laying on the ground for everybody, come and get um" \*explosions\*

My hill.

> 
> I call in an airstrike on Designer225, then retake the hill.
> My hill.

\*Facepalm\* Since when did I take the hill? I never did several posts back, and this is no exception. Besides bombs can be inaccurate.

> 
> "hey guys, there are pancakes laying on the ground for everybody, come and get um" \*explosions\*
> My hill.

I sniped you 1200 feet away, then ran into a boat for getaway.

No one's hill.

You hit me in a non-lethal area and I take over the hill. I then proceed to build a glass dome around the hill.

My hill.

I take a big hammer and smash the glass dome.

My hill.

I fix the glass dome with lots of duct tape.

My hill with a broken glass dome fixed with duct tape.

I brought it down by dive-bombing it, then escaped just as the next poster encounters the hill.

No one's hill... almost...

I use a secret tunnel that I secretly constructed to secretly go to the hill. I then realize that no one it there and I occupy the hill.

My hill.

PS: typo in the last letter your forum signature.
